Category

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Icategory } from 'src/app/Models/icategory'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'] }) export class ProductListComponent { Category:Icategory[] SelectedCategoryId:number =0; constructor(){ this.Category=[ {id:1,name:'mahmoud'} ] } }
